tool_description: Analyzes images to extract visual elements, context, and semantic information needed for alternative text generation.

image_url.description: URL or file path to the image to be analyzed

analysis_depth.description: Level of analysis: basic, detailed, comprehensive

content_type.description: Type of image: photo, illustration, icon, logo, diagram

error_messages: Invalid image URL: Provide a valid URL or accessible file path to the image.
Unsupported image format: Use common formats like JPG, PNG, GIF, SVG, or WebP.
Image access error: Ensure the image is accessible and not corrupted.
Invalid analysis depth: Use one of [basic, detailed, comprehensive].
Invalid content type: Use one of [photo, illustration, icon, logo, diagram].
usage: Provide image_url and optionally specify analysis_depth and content_type. The tool returns structured information about visual elements, objects, text, and contextual details found in the image.

main_subject.description: Primary subject or focus of the image

objects_detected.description: List of objects, people, or elements identified in the image

text_content.description: Any text visible in the image

color_scheme.description: Dominant colors and overall color scheme
